Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE
Name: Bottle
Description: Ovoidal bottle with narrow mouth, straight flared rim and short bottleneck with concave walls, set off from the body by means of a ridge. Unstable base with concave bottom. Orangey-coloured paste and exterior surface covered with a reddish-coloured coating, partially lost. In the middle area are three striations with coating.
